name: Pollufo
description:
Created for Ludum Dare 46. Made in a bit of a rush, so it's missing many of the ideas I had. But you can shoot stuff... so that's something!

Play as an alien who stumbles upon our little planet. Seeing that there are machines everywhere poisoning the environment, he takes it upon himself to help the humans by destroying anything that pollutes the planet.

Don't hit the trees... we need them!

LMB - Fire Laser
RMB - Fire Missile
WASD / Arrows - Move

Apologies that this isn't a finished game in any sort of respect. If you download Pollufo, you'll notice I've added an Exit button available at all times to help you out!

Hope you enjoy what is there anyhow :D
